description: This file is a CMake script designed to find and configure the Nexus library for use in the build process. It searches for the necessary Nexus components, sets target properties, and handles different modes of operation based on the presence of certain libraries and files.

methods.name: find_path
methods.description: Searches for the specified header file 'nexus_config.h' within given path suffixes.

methods.name: include
methods.description: Includes other CMake modules, such as 'FindPackageHandleStandardArgs'.

methods.name: find_package_handle_standard_args
methods.description: Handles the standard process of verifying the presence of required components.

methods.name: set_target_properties
methods.description: Sets various properties on the imported Nexus target based on conditions.

methods.name: message
methods.description: Outputs informational or error messages during configuration.
